About me

My name is Paiva, Garliene and i have personal interest in computers and systems at least 25 years, it's my hobby and pretended work in future. The Ubuntu GNU/Linux is my effective system since 2011, January and now i'm a voluntary colaborator to encourage more people to use Ubuntu, participating in Brazilian Locoteams and organization of the FLISOL events in my city, Araguari, Minas Gerais, Brazyl.
